title: Assessment of elemental chemistry, spatial distribution, and potential risks of road-deposited dusts in Sharjah, United Arab Emirates
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Lucy Semerjian, Abiodun O. Adeniji, Abdallah Shanableh, Mohammad H. Semreen, Muath Mousa, Khaled Abass, Anthony Okoh
